name: Anushka on working with the Khans
description: After stepping into Bollywood in 2008 Anushka Sharma has worked with Bollywood's three Khans-Shah Rukh, Salman and Aamir, says rather than looking back at her journey and contemplate, she prefers to use the learning to do better.

name: Padmavati TRAILER | Ranveer-Deepika-Shahid's battle
description: We already saw the royal looks of the three leads Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone and Shahid Kapoor look nothing less than mesmerizing leaving the audiences awestruck, now the trailer of the film has been released. Taking to twitter the filmmakers shared the trailer video and wrote:

name: SRK's 'Kuch Kuch Hota Hai' made NO SENSE: Karan Johar
description: 'Kuch Kuch Hota Hai', a film that released in 1998, almost 20 years down the line filmmaker Karan Johar feels that the film made no sense. However, on work front, Karan is gearing for 'Ittefaq' that features Sidharth Malhotra and Sonakshi Sinha in the leads. He also has 'Drive' with Sushant Singh Rajput and Jacqueline Fernandez and 'Dragon' with Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt.

name: Salmans sister Arpita excited about hubbys Bollywood debut
description: Superstar Salman Khan's youngest sister Arpita Khan is excited about the Bollywood debut of her husband Aayush Sharma. She tweeted, "I'm so happy and excited for you! I know you will make us all proud. Love you lots Aayush Sharma!"

name: 'Judwaa 2' crosses Rs 100 CRORE mark
description: Filmmaker David Dhawans action-comedy film "Judwaa 2", a reboot of the 1997 Salman Khan-starrer "Judwaa", has crossed the Rs 100 crore mark in eight days since its release, the makers have said. Released on September 29, the movie, starring Varun Dhawan, Jacqueline Fernandez and Taapsee Pannu in the lead, minted Rs 4.25 crore on Friday, thus taking its cumulative total to Rs 102.33 crore.
